LanguageData.LevelUp.LevelUpActionHeaderDescription: List of actions that, if active, are executed when a colonist levels up a skill.
LanguageData.LevelUp.LevelDownActionHeaderDescription: List of actions that, if active, are executed when a colonist levels down a skill.
LanguageData.LevelUp.CooldownEntryDescription: The duration of a cooldown specified in real-time seconds.\n\nIf applied to an action, the action will not execute for the same colonist and skill again until the cooldown has run out.
LanguageData.LevelUp.CooldownOnActionDescription: Whether or not Cooldown should apply for this action.\n\nIf applied, this action will not execute for the same colonist and skill again until the cooldown has run out.
LanguageData.LevelUp.HistoricalDescription: Whether or not the message should be saved in history.
